info.title: Recruitment Registry
info.description: Survey Based Match of Participants to Clinical Trials

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic authentication header 'Basic ...' where '...' is base64 encoded string for 'username:password'

get.description: Returns JWT token that can be used as API key.  Prefix with 'Bearer ' before pasting.

parameters.name: newSurvey
parameters.description: Definition of a new survey.  Existing questions have 'id' only and new questions have other fields.

get.description: Only returns id and name fields.

patch.summary: Updates or translates survey text fields

post.description: This persists answers to survey questions.  Old answers are soft deleted.  For each question for which there is no answer property, any existing answer will be soft deleted.

patch.summary: Updates or translates question text fields

post.description: Each consent type describes a consent section that users have to accept for various registry functionality.  There can be multiple consent sections with the same type but only one of them can be active at one time.

patch.summary: Updates or translates consent type tetx fields

get.summary: Gets update comments history for consent type

parameters.name: consent_documents
parameters.description: Id of consent documents to be signed

get.summary: Gets consent document (section)/signature by type name
Gets current user consents by name

patch.summary: Updates or translates reset password text fields

get.description: Only returns id, name and status fields.

get.summary: Gets answered survey and its status

post.summary: Create answers and set status for survey

patch.summary: Updates or translates question choice textx

newSurveyQuestion.description: Describes either a brand new question (no 'id') or an existing question ('id' only with 'required').
